explanations.machine learning: The paper proposes a model based on deep reinforcement learning, which is a subset of machine learning.
explanations.reinforcement learning: The study explicitly mentions using deep reinforcement learning for stock trading strategies.
explanations.deep learning: The model combines deep reinforcement learning, transformer layers, and a U-Net architecture, all of which are deep learning techniques.
explanations.neural network: The proposed model uses transformer layers and a U-Net architecture, which are types of neural networks.
explanations.representation learning: The model learns to capture complex dynamic patterns in financial markets, which involves learning representations from data.
explanations.hidden layer: Neural networks, including the transformer and U-Net used in the paper, typically contain hidden layers.
explanations.attention mechanism: Transformer layers, which are part of the proposed model, utilize attention mechanisms to capture patterns in data.
